Use a sun-protective spray: A sun-protective spray can be applied to your head to create a barrier between your skin and the sun's harmful UV rays.
Wear a scarf or bandana: A scarf or bandana can be worn over your head to shield your head from the sun.
Use a cooling gel or cream: A cooling gel or cream can be applied to your head to help cool you down and protect your skin from sunburn.
Use a sun umbrella: A portable sun umbrella can be set up around your head to provide shade and protect your head from the sun.
Wear a helmet: A helmet can provide protection for your head from the sun's harmful UV rays, although it may not be the most practical solution.
